divs: Sighting DetailsI live in North Las Vegas, Nevada and in the beginning of last August for a week I saw a metallic round object appearing and disappearing in the sky around the park where I take my walks every day around 9 AM to 10:30 AM. I told my husband when he went to walk the dog to please check the sky around that area also because I thought I was loosing it. That Friday my husband came back to the house all excited because he saw it as well. We decided to ask our son ,since he has a video-camera, to come with us on a family UFO hunting picnic, to see if we could see the object and film it. That Sunday morning we got there at 9 AM, we saw the UFO five times. My son got it on video twice and exactly what we saw is the video I am sending you. I'm not saying it is ours and I'm not saying that it is not ours I'm saying that I don't know. What you are going to see in the video is exactly what we saw. I would appreciate it if you would be so kind as to give me your opinion. Thank you for your time and effort.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in North Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in North Las Vegas on or around August 22nd 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
